ruleSummaries.description: The default natural language for content and text strings shall be specified using the Lang entry, with a non-empty value, in the catalog dictionary

checks.errorMessage: Catalog dictionary does not contain Lang entry

ruleSummaries.description: All destinations whose target lies within the current document shall be structure destinations

checks.errorMessage: Destination in GoTo action is not a structure destination

ruleSummaries.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

checks.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

ruleSummaries.description: The ViewerPreferences dictionary of the document catalog dictionary shall be present and shall contain at least the DisplayDocTitle key with a value of true, as described in ISO 32000-2:2020, Table 147

checks.errorMessage: ViewerPreferences dictionary is not present in the document Catalog, or DisplayDocTitle key is set to false or is not present in the ViewerPreferences dictionary (ViewerPreferences = null, DisplayDocTitle = null)

ruleSummaries.description: The Metadata stream as specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3 in the document catalog dictionary shall contain a dc:title entry

checks.errorMessage: Metadata stream does not contain dc:title

ruleSummaries.description: The structure tree root shall contain a single Document structure element as its only child. The namespace for that element shall be specified as the PDF 2.0 namespace

checks.errorMessage: The structure tree root contains a single Document structure element, but this element is not within the PDF 2.0 namespace (namespace URI = http://iso.org/pdf/ssn)

ruleSummaries.description: Every page that includes an annotation shall contain a Tabs entry in its page dictionary in accordance with ISO 32000-2:2020, Table 31, and its value shall be A, W or S
